name: Coconut Curry Mussels
description: A restaurant favourite made easy—at home! Simply serve with naan or toasted bread for dipping to make a delicious entrée for 2 or impressive appy for 4.

ingredients.name: Keema Curry Seasoning or Crispy & Crunchy Lettuce Wrap Seasoning

preparation:
1. Rinse mussels under cold water. Discard any that are already open.
  2. In Wok, combine seasoning and coconut milk. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
  3. Add mussels and cover with lid. Steam 6–7 min or until mussels open. Discard any unopened mussels.
  4. Using 2-in-1 Citrus Press, squeeze in juice from lime.
tips: Swap mussels with clams or 1 lb (450 g) prawns or shrimp.
